org.ingatan.component.text
Class EmbeddedMathTeX

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  org.ingatan.component.text.EmbeddedGraphic
                      org.ingatan.component.text.EmbeddedMathTeX
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class EmbeddedMathTeX
extends EmbeddedGraphic

A JPanel which displays rendered JMathTeX. This is used as an embedded component for the RichTextArea as it is able to pass back its JMathTeX for serialisation.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Thomas Everingham
See Also:
Serialized Form
